content.rendered:
Monday, November 4, 2024
Today is a “B” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Introduction to Bagpiping club will meet on Monday after school in P222.
  • International Club will be meeting after school today, on Monday, November 4 in room 255. All are welcome to join us!
  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club: there will be a meeting after school in the Large Group Room with Ms. Schnorr on Wednesday, November 6. Please check the club’s Canvas page for more information. See you there!
  • Math Club will be meeting Wednesday, November 6 after school in Room R232. See Mrs. Miles for any questions.
  • Any 7th or 8th grade student interested in joining the modified wrestling team, please attend the informational meeting on Friday November 8th, during your 7th or 8th grade flex in Coach Martucci’s room, 185 excelsior. Please see Coach Martucci, Coach Russell, or Coach Wetzel with any questions and bring a friend!!
  • If you have any last-minute unwanted Halloween candy lying around, we would love to send it off to our troops! Collection bins are available at every house office and the main office- The bins will be picked up on Tuesday 11/12 to get sent off to our military for the holiday season. You can drop it in the bins located outside of each house office, or the main office. Thanks for helping us pay it forward this holiday season!
  • Our school newspapers’ FIRST ISSUE is PUBLISHED- Teachers and students head to CLEVER to find the MAPLETOGIAN APP to read our SCHOOL news! Happy reading!
  • The Saratoga Springs Rec Basketball League at the Rec Center has openings in both its Boys and Girls 6 to 8th Grade divisions. Sign up now at SaratogaRec.Com.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
